case_001.plny_skutek_short: This is an example case description. Replace this with your actual qualitative data text. The text should be detailed enough for meaningful analysis.

case_002.plny_skutek_short: Another example case. Each case should have a unique ID and the text you want to analyze. You can add other metadata fields as needed.

case_003.plny_skutek_short: Third example demonstrating the data format. The system will analyze these texts and generate themes.
case_003.optional_metadata_field: You can add any additional fields
